material: 100% Organic European Linen, certified with STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX.
productShortDescription: The ultimate effortless jumpsuit - the Freddy has adjustable straps, side pockets and a tie waist. Keep it cool and tie this jumpsuit in the front, or take it from day to night with a bow at the back. For colder weather, style the Freddy over a t-shirt or turtleneck. Made in the Netherlands with 100% organic linen and available in ecru. Plus free Pina Studio tote with every order.
fit:
Marie wears size S / M. She is 1.8m tall (5'10") and normally wears an EU 36.

In summary, our size S / M fits from EU 36-38. Our M / L fits from EU 38-40. If you're between sizes, take a S / M for a more fitted look, and a M / L for a looser fit.
production: This garment is handmade in the Netherlands in small batches with a responsible factory. Itâ€™s made of certified OEKO-TEX organic linen sourced from Germany with flax grown in South West Europe.
additionalNotes: We ship from Amsterdam within 1-2 business days of your order.
